title: Modern Data Streaming Strategy

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description


Provides support and reference architecture to handle modern data streaming:

- cloud-native and horizontal scaling
- end-to-end back-pressure
- elasticity (from 0 to n)
- stateless and stateful processing (with a proper snapshot and state support)
- end-to-end security (encryption / TLS)
- multi-protocols
- graceful remediation (#34194)

### Analysis
(links to analysis docs containing architecture design work, requirements gathering, etc)
